prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that resembles a small dog with fluffy fur and a wagging tail.
Imagine a Pokemon that runs fast and is known for its loyalty and friendliness to trainers.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon that has a mix of brown and cream colors with bright eyes.
Generate a cute Pokemon that loves to explore urban areas and play with other Pokemon.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of adventure and is always ready to help others.
Make a small quadruped Pokemon that has distinct floppy ears and a lively personality.
Give me a Pokemon that enjoys living in grassy areas and has a cheerful demeanor.
